attributes.name: pie-width
attributes.description:
`pieWidth` a way to indicate the width of the radius (either in % or absolute value).
If set, inner radius will be inferred.

attributes.name: shaper
attributes.description: `shaper`  shaper function for generating path ([for instance, pie](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape#lines)

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: `key`  some drawable need to have a key (for example lines in a line chart, to as to apply a colorScale)

attributes.name: color-scale
attributes.description: `colorScale` colorScale to use for the chart (example d3.scaleOrdinal().range(d3.schemeCategory10);)

properties.name: pieWidth
properties.description:
`pieWidth` a way to indicate the width of the radius (either in % or absolute value).
If set, inner radius will be inferred.

properties.name: shaper
properties.description: `shaper`  shaper function for generating path ([for instance, pie](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape#lines)

properties.name: key
properties.description: `key`  some drawable need to have a key (for example lines in a line chart, to as to apply a colorScale)

properties.name: colorScale
properties.description: `colorScale` colorScale to use for the chart (example d3.scaleOrdinal().range(d3.schemeCategory10);)

properties.name: dataProcessType
properties.description: `dataProcessType` the type of data processing. Stacked data (e.g. for bar chart) will be stacked

properties.name: targetElement
properties.description: `targetElement` getter override lifecycle Behavior and called during attached
